title: Ilhan to DNC: That It? Kamala Is The Pick (Deep Breath) 8.13.20
itunes:title: Ilhan to DNC: That It? Kamala Is The Pick (Deep Breath) 8.13.20
description:
In episode 693, Jack and Miles are joined by Vanguard Army podcast co-host and Rezistans Nwa member Aaron Thorpe to discuss Joe Biden's VP pick Kamala Harris, Ilhan Omar winning in Minnesota, the Planters baby marketing, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump Calls Biden VP Pick Kamala Harris ‘A Dangerous Choice’
  2. Tucker Carlson responds to guest correcting pronunciation of Kamala Harris's name: 'So what?'
  3. Trump, a Total Non-Phony, Gave Money to Kamala Harris’ Past Campaigns
  4. Minnesota Primary Election Results: Fifth Congressional District
  5. Planters Baby Nut is turning 21 and is now named Peanut Jr.
  6. Planters brings Mr. Peanut back to life in Super Bowl commercial
  7. WATCH: Lianne La Havas - Weird Fishes (Official Music Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
